channel.title: An Item That Turns A Character Invisible?
channel.description: Is it possible to make an item turn someone invisible and stay stationary? Much like the effect of an easter ring or a ring of stone. An item with a low polygonal count and doesn't permanently make you invisible.

item.title: An Item That Turns A Character Invisible?
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Well, in my server, there are a few invisible items and if you wear them, then either teleport somewhere else or relog, it made you invisible but you could move.

I’m sure you can make it wear they can’t move but I am unaware of how to. D:

Read full topic
item.source: An Item That Turns A Character Invisible?

item.title: An Item That Turns A Character Invisible?
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

Kaex:

Yes. Add an item corruptly lol. :eek:

Does that make the user permanently invisible? Can I make it to where it disables movement?

Read full topic
